entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
